briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of CDB-2914 for Emergency Contraception
officialTitle: A Prospective, Open-Label, Single Arm, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of CDB-2914 as Emergency Contraception When Taken Between 48 Hours and 120 Hours of Unprotected Sex
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of CDB-2914 for preventing pregnancy when taken 3 to 5 days after unprotected sexual intercourse.
